EmailTemplate.name: EB-07-14-202207-EMP-CHBC-NSWLTR-Partner-Essentials-Newsletter-Consultant.Partner
EmailTemplate.subject: Our commitment to health equity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Partner Essentials FEATURED Making health equity the rule, not the exception At Teladoc Health we are committed to promoting health equity in every aspect of our organization: from the people we hire, to the programs and services we design, to the investments we make to improve clinical quality and healthcare access. All our products are developed to meet individuals where they are. More than half of our chronic care solutions active users live in vulnerable or underserved communities, which is why we provide support for phone-based preferences, low-bandwidth circumstances, mobility issues and over 240 languages.1 Learn about our commitment to health equity and how that might benefit those whom you support. Read the article <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/article/a-four-pronged-approach-to-addressing-health-inequity/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=consultant&utm_campaign=2022-july-consultant-partner-essentials]]> EVENTS Forum 2022 Last chance to register! <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=partner-essentials-may&utm_medium=email&utm_content=channel&utm_campaign=forum-22]]> July 20–22, 2022 | Boston, MA and Virtual
From clinical perspectives to innovative approaches and beyond, hear from executives at organizations like 3M, Microsoft, FujiFilm, Delta, Aon, Segal, Marsh McLennan Agency, SAP, State Farm, American Telemedicine Association and more about the value and future of virtual care.
Featured speakers include:
AON Kim Hurst, Large Market Leader, Health Solutions
Segal Consulting Sadhna Paralkar, MD, MPH, MBA, Senior Vice President & National Medical Director
Marsh McLennan Agency Betsy Nota-Kirby, MS, Vice President, National Health Management Consulting RESOURCES When it comes to diabetes, no two paths are the same because no two individuals are the same <[[https://www.statnews.com/sponsor/2022/07/05/when-it-comes-to-diabetes-no-two-paths-are-the-same-because-no-two-individuals-are-the-same/]]> Dr. Vidya Raman-Tangella, Teladoc Health Chief Medical Officer, discusses how providing healthcare that combines insights from health data with personal preferences can empower individuals to address their healthcare needs. Healthcare Insider Podcast: How Teladoc Health is prioritizing equal access to virtual care <[[https://www.modernhealthcare.com/technology/healthcare-insider-podcast-how-teladoc-health-prioritizing-equal-access-virtual-care]]> Hear our own Stephany Verstraete on the latest episode of Healthcare Insider talk about how Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience to empower people everywhere to live their healthiest lives and to accelerate a future where all people are seen, heard and understood relative to their healthcare needs. Case Study: Multi-program chronic condition solutions amplify outcomes <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/EMP/multi-program-chronic-condition-solutions-amplify-outcomes/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=consultant&utm_campaign=2022-july-consultant-partner-essentials]]> This study of more than 24,000 people with multiple chronic conditions across 34 Teladoc Health clients showcases the impact of an integrated chronic care management program. These people are living with one anchor condition such as diabetes, hypertension or prediabetes, and may also struggle with mental health challenges such as stress, depression or anxiety. Primary Care Interactive Journey <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/primary-care/interactive-referral-journey/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=consultant&utm_campaign=2022-july-consultant-partner-essentials]]> Follow along on a patient's journey to learn how Primary360 evaluates an individual's needs, guides them to the right clinical resources, and ultimately delivers timely, convenient care. Case Study: Creating a healthier workplace from within <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/teladoc-health-creating-a-healthier-workplace-from-within/?utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=consultant&utm_campaign=2022-july-consultant-partner-essentials]]> Teladoc Health recently implemented a comprehensive virtual primary care program for our own employees through our new Primary360 offering. Learn how the program was received—and how it performed within our own organization. Podcast: Virtual Care Transformation with Kim LaFontana featured on AHIP's The Next Big Thing in Health <[[https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/virtual-care-and-using-data-to-improve-outcomes/id1477333353?i=1000555709568]]> AHIP President and CEO Matt Eyles and co-host Laura Evans were joined by Teladoc Health's own Kim LaFontana, Senior Vice President of Strategic Growth, to discuss our new virtual care transformation study and how we use data to drive the best health outcomes. Case Study: Early outcomes lead to lasting results <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/EMP/virtual-chronic-care-early-outcomes-lead-to-lasting-results/]]> USI Insurance Services understands the value of a healthy workforce. Learn how our successful partnership with USI has led to 31 new clients and a 92% renewal rate. IN THE NEWS A Look at How Virtual-First Care Expands Access to Mental Health Care Solutions <[[https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/look-how-virtual-first-care-expands-access-mental-health-gorevic/?trackingId=yLN208LUsXcJo3DgzcOufA%3D%3D]]> 3 Trends Shaping Virtual Care Strategies <[[https://www.benefitspro.com/2022/05/19/3-trends-shaping-virtual-care-strategies/?slreturn=20220605173508]]> The Next Chapter of Telemedicine <[[https://www.leadersedge.com/healthcare/the-next-chapter-of-telemedicine]]> Top Companies 2022: Health Care <[[https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/top-companies-2022-health-care-linkedin-news/?trackingId=uA9%2F%2Fo0krpNPEU%2BPwhmeFA%3D%3D]]> FAST FACT Employees who don't think their employer prioritizes diversity and equity are twice as likely to be at risk for leaving <[[https://www.pressganey.com/about-us/news/press-ganey-uncovers-impact-diversity-equity-on-retention]]> 1Internal Teladoc Health Data (PM017389.B) About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
